name: Demon Malice
flavor: At the start of any level 10 or higher demon's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.effect: The demon activates a Malice feature available to demons of level 9 or lower.
One demon acting this turn unleashes their pent-up agony and pain on every non-demon in a 5 burst. Each target makes a **Presence test**.
effects.tier1: 10 corruption damage; the target is soul flensed

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The demon removes all conditions and effects on themself that can be ended by a saving throw, and transfers all those effects to each creature soul flensed this way.
